MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer, affecting properties in Bayview Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 12.07pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.58pm on Monday 23rd November 2020.
